attributes.action: Save Brooklands College Ashford Campus from closure and ensure A Level provision continues to be offered at the Weybridge Campus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the inability for Brooklands College, Weybridge to secure funds from the LSC for it’s ambitious redevelopment plans, we must save the College’s Ashford Campus from closure and subsequent site disposal and ensure that the College continues to offer a broad choice courses and qualifications, including A Level subjects (at the moment due to be scrapped in 2010), for current students and future young people living in the immediate and surrounding areas.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save Brooklands College Ashford Campus from closure and ensure A Level provision continues to be offered at the Weybridge Campus."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22938


Prime Minister's Office
